name: GATE
author: CREATIS lab

inputs.name: Gate archive input
inputs.description: A zip file produced by the GATE-Lab containing all your simulation input files

inputs.name: Number of GATE Jobs
inputs.description: The number of the parallel jobs should be chosen in relation to the total running time of your simulation on a single machine. For a small execution of a few minutes to a few hours, a single job will be the most efficient. For simulations lasting for more than a few weeks, you can choose the maximum of 500 jobs.

inputs.name: Job Number
inputs.description: This should be an iterator on numberOfJobs  rendered invisible to the user

inputs.name: Macfile Name
inputs.description: Name of the main macfile used

output-files.name: Output
output-files.description: The output tarball including GATE resuls

description: This application runs GATE on the EGI eInfrastructure. The documentation entry point is available here.
